event.description: Brett Gardner strikes out swinging, catcher Derek Norris to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Gary Sanchez flies out to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Greg Bird strikes out swinging.
Matt Holliday grounds out, shortstop Tim Beckham to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Jacoby Ellsbury homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Starlin Castro flies out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr.
Chase Headley pops out to third baseman Evan Longoria.
Aaron Judge strikes out swinging.
Ronald Torreyes lines out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr.
Brett Gardner walks.
Gary Sanchez singles on a ground ball to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier. Brett Gardner to 3rd.
Greg Bird grounds out softly, pitcher Alex Cobb to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Matt Holliday flies out to left fielder Mallex Smith.
Jacoby Ellsbury strikes out on a foul tip.
Starlin Castro grounds out sharply, third baseman Evan Longoria to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Chase Headley doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Aaron Judge reaches on a fielder's choice out, shortstop Tim Beckham to third baseman Evan Longoria to second baseman Brad Miller to pitcher Alex Cobb. Chase Headley out at 3rd. Aaron Judge to 2nd.
Ronald Torreyes grounds out, pitcher Alex Cobb to second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison. Aaron Judge to 3rd.
Brett Gardner pops out to second baseman Brad Miller.
Gary Sanchez flies out sharply to left fielder Mallex Smith.
Greg Bird bunt grounds out, third baseman Evan Longoria to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Matt Holliday singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Mallex Smith.
Pitching Change: Xavier Cedeno replaces Alex Cobb.
Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a soft ground ball to shortstop Tim Beckham. Matt Holliday to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Jumbo Diaz replaces Xavier Cedeno.
Starlin Castro strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Erasmo Ramirez replaces Jumbo Diaz.
Chase Headley walks.
Aaron Judge grounds into a double play, shortstop Tim Beckham to second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison. Chase Headley out at 2nd.
Ronald Torreyes flies out to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Brett Gardner singles on a line drive to left fielder Mallex Smith.
With Gary Sanchez batting, passed ball by Derek Norris, Brett Gardner to 2nd.
Gary Sanchez grounds out, shortstop Tim Beckham to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Greg Bird called out on strikes.
Matt Holliday grounds out, second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Pitching Change: Alex Colome replaces Erasmo Ramirez.
Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a line drive to shortstop Tim Beckham, deflected by pitcher Alex Colome.
Starlin Castro grounds into a double play, third baseman Evan Longoria to second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison. Jacoby Ellsbury out at 2nd.
Chase Headley singles on a ground ball to third baseman Evan Longoria, deflected by pitcher Alex Colome.
With Aaron Judge batting, Chase Headley advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Aaron Judge flies out to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Corey Dickerson homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Kevin Kiermaier flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Evan Longoria strikes out swinging.
Brad Miller grounds out, third baseman Chase Headley to first baseman Greg Bird.
Steven Souza Jr. singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Logan Morrison singles on a pop up to second baseman Starlin Castro. Steven Souza Jr. to 2nd.
Tim Beckham strikes out swinging.
With Mallex Smith batting, wild pitch by Michael Pineda, Steven Souza Jr. to 3rd. Logan Morrison to 2nd.

Rays challenged (home-plate collision), call on the field was upheld: Mallex Smith reaches on a fielder's choice out, third baseman Chase Headley to catcher Gary Sanchez. Steven Souza Jr. out at home. Logan Morrison to 3rd.
With Derek Norris batting, Mallex Smith steals (1) 2nd base.
Derek Norris singles on a ground ball to right fielder Aaron Judge. Logan Morrison scores. Mallex Smith scores.
With Corey Dickerson batting, Derek Norris steals (1) 2nd base.
Corey Dickerson singles on a ground ball to right fielder Aaron Judge. Derek Norris scores.
Kevin Kiermaier singles on a ground ball to right fielder Aaron Judge. Corey Dickerson to 3rd.
Yankees challenged (tag play), call on the field was overturned: With Evan Longoria batting, Kevin Kiermaier caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Gary Sanchez to second baseman Starlin Castro.
Evan Longoria strikes out swinging.
Brad Miller strikes out swinging.
Steven Souza Jr. grounds out, shortstop Ronald Torreyes to first baseman Greg Bird.
Logan Morrison singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Tim Beckham strikes out on a foul tip.
Mallex Smith singles on a line drive to left fielder Brett Gardner. Logan Morrison to 2nd.
Derek Norris strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Tommy Layne replaces Michael Pineda.
With Corey Dickerson batting, passed ball by Gary Sanchez, Logan Morrison to 3rd. Mallex Smith to 2nd.
Corey Dickerson pops out to second baseman Starlin Castro.
Kevin Kiermaier grounds out, second baseman Starlin Castro to first baseman Greg Bird.
Evan Longoria walks.
Brad Miller pops out to second baseman Starlin Castro.
Pitching Change: Adam Warren replaces Tommy Layne.
Steven Souza Jr. lines out to right fielder Aaron Judge.
Logan Morrison called out on strikes.
Tim Beckham grounds out, shortstop Ronald Torreyes to first baseman Greg Bird.
Mallex Smith strikes out swinging.
Derek Norris grounds out, shortstop Ronald Torreyes to first baseman Greg Bird.
Corey Dickerson strikes out swinging.
Kevin Kiermaier strikes out on a foul tip.
Pitching Change: Chasen Shreve replaces Adam Warren.
Evan Longoria lines out to left fielder Brett Gardner.
Brad Miller grounds out, second baseman Starlin Castro to first baseman Greg Bird.
Steven Souza Jr. walks.
Logan Morrison grounds out softly, pitcher Chasen Shreve to first baseman Greg Bird.
